Eduardo Westerdahl (Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, 1902 - ibidem, 1983) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Spain, onye na-enyocha nka na odee, na onye otu Surrealist Movement.
A mụrụ Westerdahl nye nne Catalan na nna Swedish
Agụmakwụkwọ ya bụ na njikwa azụmaahịa
O na-enweta ego dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ.

Mmasị onwe ya na nkà ihe ọmụma na nka mere ka o guzobe mbipụta Iletras y Pajaritas de Papel ma bụrụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ nka Gaceta del arte (nke ekeputara n'afọ1932) nke na-eduga n'etiti magazin nka na ọdịbendị Europe.

Ọ bụ ezie na o nyere aka nke ukwuu n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ dị mkpa, otu ọrụ nke nyere ya aha bụ nguzobe nke The Contemporary Art Museum Eduardo Westerdahl na Puerto de la Cruz (Canary Islands) nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ebe ngosi ihe kachasị mkpa maka nka Spanish nke oge a.
